text: Kazim Kartal (April 28, 1936 – August 13, 2003) was a Turkish film and television actor. == Biography == Kazım Kartal, who started his art life in 1964, is the name of a very unknown hero in Turkish cinema. During his artistic career, Kartal has been involved in almost 1000 films (350 that can be identified), has written two screenplays, has undertaken a Filmin directorship. After his illness in Erzurum, Hınıs and returning to Istanbul, he soon lost his life due to a heart attack. == Filmography == * Toprağa Kan Düştü – 2003 * Kirve – 2003 * Seni Yaşatacağım – 2002 *
